actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to replace the seawall located at Mandeville, St. Tammany Parish, Louisiana.

summary.text: Modifies the hurricane flood protection project on Lake Ponchartrain to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to replace the seawall at Mandeville, Saint Tammany Parish, Louisiana. States the finding of Congress that the application of the Flood Control Act of 1970 results in benefits from the flood control measures exceeding their economic costs.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to replace the seawall located at Mandeville, St. Tammany Parish, Louisiana.
